arStrings.szText: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance when dealing Lightning damage to overload the target for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, causing any direct damage you deal to them to pulse {c_number}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_2]{/c} additional damage to surrounding enemies.

Dealing Lightning damage has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to cause your direct damage to pulse {c_number}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_2]{/c} additional damage.
